articles.title: Resolving digital threats 100x faster with OpenAI
articles.description: Discover how Outtake uses GPT-4.1 and OpenAI o3 to power AI agents that detect and resolve digital threats 100x faster than before.

articles.title: Announcing OpenAI DevDay 2025
articles.description: OpenAI DevDay returns on October 6, 2025 in San Francisco—bringing together 1,500+ developers to preview new tools, hear from OpenAI leaders, and shape the future of AI.

articles.title: Model ML is helping financial firms rebuild with AI from the ground up
articles.description: As part of our Executive Function series, Model ML CEO Chaz Englander discusses how AI-native infrastructure and autonomous agents are transforming financial services workflows.

articles.title: Pioneering an AI clinical copilot with Penda Health
articles.description: OpenAI and Penda Health debut an AI clinical copilot that cuts diagnostic errors by 16% in real-world use—offering a new path for safe, effective AI in healthcare.

articles.title: OpenAI’s new economic analysis
articles.description: Analysis provides insights into ChatGPT’s impact on the economy. OpenAI also launches new research collaboration to study AI’s broader effects on the labor market and productivity.

articles.title: Stargate advances with 4.5 GW partnership with Oracle
articles.description: Oracle and OpenAI have entered an agreement to develop 4.5 gigawatts of additional Stargate data center capacity in the U.S. This investment will create new jobs, accelerate America’s reindustrialization, and help advance U.S. AI leadership. It also marks a major milestone for Stargate, OpenAI’s AI infrastructure platform and long-term vision to deliver the benefits of AI to everyone.
articles.summary: Oracle and OpenAI have entered an agreement to develop 4.5 gigawatts of additional Stargate data center capacity in the U.S. This investment will create new jobs, accelerate America’s reindustrialization, and help advance U.S. AI leadership. It also marks a major milestone for Stargate, OpenAI’s AI infrastructure platform and long-term vision to deliver the benefits of AI to everyone.

It also marks a major milestone for Stargate, OpenAI’s AI infrastructure platform and long-term vision to deliver the benefits of AI to everyone.

articles.title: OpenAI and UK Government announce strategic partnership to deliver AI-driven growth
articles.description: OpenAI partners with the UK Government to boost AI adoption, drive economic growth, and enhance public services for a thriving AI ecosystem in the UK.
articles.summary: OpenAI partners with the UK Government to boost AI adoption, drive economic growth, and enhance public services for a thriving AI ecosystem in the UK.

articles.title: AI as the greatest source of empowerment for all
articles.description: I’ve always considered myself a pragmatic technologist—someone who loves technology not for its own sake, but for the direct impact it can have on people’s lives. That’s what makes this job so exciting, since I believe AI will unlock more opportunities for more people than any other technology in history. If we get this right, AI can give everyone more power than ever.

articles.title: A $50 million fund to build with communities
articles.description: OpenAI is launching an initial $50 million fund that supports nonprofit and community organizations, informed by the independent OpenAI Nonprofit Commission report.

articles.title: Introducing ChatGPT agent
articles.description: Introducing ChatGPT agent: it thinks and acts, using tools to complete tasks like research, bookings, and slideshows—all with your guidance.
